description.value:
Prerequisites expert in Society; @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.iCv8KTZ5PcF4GqeV]{Connections} or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gydOsP9VsdRw3Wg1]{Underground Network}

You know where to go, who to talk to, and how to make new connections, fast. Upon entering a new settlement, spending 1 day of downtime allows you to build enough connections to make use of the Connections or Underworld Connections feats. If youâ€™re legendary in Society, you can form the required connections within 1 hour of entering a new settlement.

prerequisites.value: expert in Society; Connections or Underworld Connections
